sentences.sContent: The system can support an unlimited number of users.
sentences.sCn: 该系统可以支持无限多的用户。

sentences.sContent: The ticket offers unlimited travel on the London underground for seven days.
sentences.sCn: 凭本票可在七日内无限次乘坐伦敦地铁。

sentences.sContent: ...you would have to have it under the unlimited mileage conditions...
...Those service contracts include unlimited data use...

synos.tran: [数]无限制的；无限量的；无条件的
